discover.instruction: Read these sentences about the future. Notice the 'if' structure.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай эти предложения о будущем. Обрати внимание на структуру с 'if'.

content.text: <highlight>If</highlight> it rains tomorrow, I <highlight>will</highlight> stay home. <highlight>If</highlight> I pass the exam, my parents <highlight>will</highlight> be happy. <highlight>If</highlight> she doesn't call, I <highlight>won't</highlight> go to the party. <highlight>If</highlight> you study hard, you <highlight>will</highlight> succeed. <highlight>If</highlight> we leave now, we <highlight>will</highlight> arrive on time. <highlight>If</highlight> he doesn't hurry, he <highlight>will</highlight> miss the train. What <highlight>will</highlight> you do <highlight>if</highlight> you win the lottery?
content.question: What tense is used after 'if'? What follows in the main clause?
content.question_ru: Какое время используется после 'if'? Что следует в главной части?

theory.title: First Conditional - Real future possibilities
theory.title_ru: Первое условное - Реальные возможности в будущем

points.example: If it rains, I will stay home.

points.rule: Use: Real possibilities in the future
points.example: If I have time, I will call you. (maybe I will have time)

points.rule: Order can change (comma only when 'if' is first)
points.rule_ru: Порядок можно менять (запятая только когда 'if' в начале)
points.example: If you call, I will answer. = I will answer if you call.
If she doesn't come, I won't wait.
If it rains... (NOT: If it will rain...)

notice.instruction: Find all conditionals. Identify the if-clause and the result clause.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все условные предложения. Определи условие и результат.

tasks.text: I'm planning my weekend. If the weather is good, I'll go to the beach. If my friends are free, we'll have a barbecue. If it rains, we'll stay home and watch movies. I'll be disappointed if the weather is bad. If I don't finish my homework tonight, I won't be able to go. My parents will be angry if I don't call them. What will you do if you have free time?

find.if_clause: If I don't finish my homework
find.result: I won't be able to go

notice.reflection_question: Why don't we say 'If it will rain, I will stay home'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему мы не говорим 'If it will rain, I will stay home'?

sentences.sentence: If he ___ (be) late, the boss ___ (be) angry.
We ___ (go) out if the weather ___ (be) nice.

questions.sentence: If I ___ time, I will call you.
She will be happy if she ___ the test.
If it rains, we ___ go outside.
What will you do if you ___ your job?
If you ___ help, just call me.

sentences.incorrect: If it will rain, I will stay home.
sentences.correct: If it rains, I will stay home.

sentences.incorrect: If she studies, she pass the exam.
sentences.correct: If she studies, she will pass the exam.

sentences.incorrect: I call you if I have time.
sentences.correct: I will call you if I have time.

produce.instruction: Write about your plans using first conditional.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о своих планах, используя первый тип условных предложений.
prompts: What will you do if the weather is good/bad this weekend?
What will happen if you pass/fail your exams?
What will you do if you get a promotion/raise?
What will happen if you don't finish your work?
produce.example: This weekend, if the weather is good, I will go hiking. If it rains, I'll stay home and read. If my friend calls, we'll go to a cafe. If I have time, I'll start learning guitar. If I don't finish my project, my boss won't be happy. I'll be very happy if I get a raise next month.

texts.title: Weather Plans
texts.content: I'm checking the weather for my trip. If it's sunny, I'll go to the beach. If it rains, I'll visit museums instead. If it's too hot, I'll stay by the pool. If the weather is perfect, I'll try hiking. If I don't bring sunscreen, I'll get sunburned. I hope the forecast is good!

texts.title: Job Interview
texts.content: I have a job interview tomorrow. If I get the job, I'll be so happy! If they offer good salary, I'll accept immediately. If I don't get it, I won't give up. I'll keep trying. If they ask about my experience, I'll tell them about my projects. If I'm nervous, I'll take deep breaths. Wish me luck!

texts.title: Party Planning
texts.content: We're planning a party. If 20 people come, we'll need more food. If it's warm, we'll have it in the garden. If it rains, we'll move inside. If everyone brings a dish, we won't need to cook much. If the music is too loud, the neighbors will complain. It will be fun if everyone comes!

texts.title: Study Goals
texts.content: I have my exams next week. If I study every day, I'll be ready. If I don't understand something, I'll ask my teacher. If I pass all exams, my parents will be proud. If I fail, I'll take them again. I won't give up if things get hard. If I get good grades, I'll celebrate!

texts.title: Health Goals
texts.content: I want to be healthier. If I exercise daily, I'll feel better. If I eat vegetables, I'll have more energy. If I don't sleep enough, I'll be tired. If I drink more water, my skin will look better. If I stop eating junk food, I'll lose weight. I'll be happier if I'm healthy.
